articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Montana, which legalized recreational marijuana in November 2020, has experienced a booming cannabis industry, with sales reaching $203 million in its first year. However, the introduction of Senate Bill 546 by Sen. Keith Regier, R-Kalispell, has sparked debate as it aims to eliminate adult-use dispensaries and significantly alter Montana’s marijuana marketplace. Understanding Senate Bill 546 [...]
articles.title: Montana’s Controversial Bill to Eliminate Adult-Use Marijuana Dispensaries

articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Delaware legalizes recreational marijuana, becoming the 22nd state to do so. The state's new laws allow for personal possession and a regulated adult-use market. The industry is expected to bring in tens of millions of dollars in tax revenue, and the state aims to promote restorative justice and reduce the prison population.
articles.title: Delaware Joins the Ranks as the 22nd State to Legalize Recreational Marijuana

articles.description: Discover the true story behind 420, the iconic day celebrated by cannabis enthusiasts around the world. articles.title: The Secret Origins of 420: Unraveling the Mysteries of Cannabis Culture’s Biggest Day
